name: Simple/Dark Wallhaven
description:
Dark Theme (Black, White, Grey, & Red)
Simple Layout
Changes Wallhaven Home Page Logo To Original Wallbase logo (As Homage To Wallbase)
Tag Colors Changed (SFW = White, Sketchy = Red, & N-SFW = Red [Underlined])
additional_info:
[Bugs]
Sometimes Skin Doesn't Load Correctly On Page Refresh/Clicked Link  
(When This Happens You Must Refresh Page Again Or Disable And Re-enable Skin To Force Skin To Load Correctly)
[Mainly Happens In Firefox]
